description:
Want to get ahead?

Become more versed in the art of being "in spirit." Indeed, inspirational leadership and having the ability to inspire others are fast becoming two of the hottest and most in-demand skills for anyone doing business today.

Whether you're an entrepreneur, small business owner, writer, teacher, coach, consultant, corporate manager...no matter what niche you're in...knowing how to inspire others can mean the difference between an average business and an extraordinary one. 

In order to inspire others, you must first be inspired...And to be inspired, you must seek out sources of inspiration and learn how to fill your inspirational tank.

Daniel H. Pink, best-selling author of A Whole New Mind: Moving from the Information Age to the Conceptual Age "“'High-touch' skills [such as empathy, imagination, and creativity] are the wave of the future as machines and automation replace much of the knowledge-based jobs once central to the economy.”

In other words, you can be paid very well for being your imperfect, messy, wonderful human self!

In this 60+-minute content-rich program, you will discover...

  • The key principles of inspiration and how to connect them to your business and life for maximum impact
  • How to create a "Red Rope Policy" to increase your productivity and profit centers
  • Insights from films like "Raiders of the Lost Ark" that can accelerate your growth while bringing you more peace of mind
  • The one question you must answer if you have any real desire to bust through to the next level in your business
  • Why knowing what isn't working in your business can be more powerful than knowing what is
  • Ways to keep your inspiration bucket constantly full

This is a unique program in that there are a lot of people teaching about motivation, not so many teaching about inspiration. If words like "purpose," "story," "meaning," "authenticity," and "compassion" resonate with you, and you want to get ahead in today's lightning-paced global culture, you will definitely want to grab your copy of this Inspired Entrepreneurs Program today!
title: Inspired Entrepreneurs: Make a Difference. Get Things Done.
